result.execSummary:
The defendant Angela R Morris was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Angela R Morris is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Angela R Morris was found guilty of Possess w/ Intent-Amphetamine(>3-10g) [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime], a class E felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(1m)(e)2.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

chargeModifiers.descr: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime

supervisions.notes: Must report to Probation no later than noon today (9/27/2016).
Must complete an AODA assessment and comply with all recommendations.

miscConds.notes: $290.60 fine/costs to be paid to the Clerk of Court Office within 60 days or set up payment plan. Failure to pay will be civil judgment. Bond is to be applied and remainder to be returned to poster.

Must provide DNA sample and pay the $250.00 DNA surcharge to the Clerk of Court Office within 60 days or set up payment plan. Failure to pay will be civil judgment. Bond to be applied and any remainder to be returned to poster.   Defendant may request expungement of the DNA sample under Wis. Stat. 165.77(4) by petitioning the Wisconsin Department of Justice. Expungement of DNA is NOT a court process. 
For information see: http://www.doj.state.wi.us/dles/crime-labs/clb-forms.
Absolute Sobriety in all regards. Cannot vote until civil rights are restored. Cannot hold elective office. If not a U.S. Citizen may face deportation or loss of other citizenship rights.
Must cooperate in trials of co-defendants.
May not possess or use firearms or body armor.

timeConds.notes: To be used by Probation Agent if necessary.
